MY FIRST CONDOM:
 
I recall my first time with a condom, I was 16 or so.
I went in to buy a packet of
condoms at the pharmacy. There was this
beautiful woman assistant behind
the counter, and she could see that I was new at it.
She handed me the package and asked if I knew how to wear one.
I honestly answered,
'No, this is my first time.' 
So she unwrapped the package, took one out
and slipped it over her thumb. 
She cautioned me to make sure it was on
tight and secure. I apparently
still looked confused. So she looked all
around the store to see if it was empty.  
It was empty. 'Just a minute,' she said, and
walked to the door, and locked it. 
Taking my hand, she led me into the back
room, unbuttoned her  blouse and removed
it. She unhooked her bra and laid it aside.
'Do these excite you?' She asked. 
Well, I was so dumb-struck that all I could
do was nod my head. She then said it was
time to slip the condom on. 
As I was slipping it on, she dropped her
skirt, removed her panties and lay down on
a desk. 
'Well, come on', she said, 'We don't have
much time.' 
So I climbed on her. It was so wonderful,
that unfortunately, I  could no longer hold
back and KAPOW, I was done within a few
minutes.  
She looked at me with a bit of a frown. 
'Did you put that condom on?', she asked.
I said, 'I sure did,' and held up my thumb(y) to
show her. 
She fainted..=))

Big Boobs vs. Little Boobs

Women with Big Boobs...

..can get a taxi on the worst days
..have men give them the best seats on a bus.
..have a neat place to carry spare change
..have always been the center of the arts (art)
..make jogging a spectator sport
..can keep a magazine dry while laying in the tub
..have more negotiating power (with men shorter than them)
..usually can find leftover popcorn after a movie
..can always carry a little extra cash
..always float better
..know where to look first for lost earrings
..rarely lack for a slow dance partner
..have a place to set their glasses when sitting in an armless recliner
..never have to buy a car with airbags
..have a place to carry a extra beer.

Women with Little Boobs...

..don't cause a traffic accident every time they bend over in public
..always look younger
..find that dribbled food makes it to the napkin on their lap
..can always see their toes and shoes
..can sleep on their stomachs
..have no trouble sliding behind the wheel of small cars
..know that people can read the entire message on their T-shirts
..know that everything more than a handful is wasted
..can come late to a theater and not disrupt an entire aisle
..can take aerobic class without running the risk of knocking themselves out
..never be accused of having implant
Nice

Ishant Kathuria Satyarth Gupta Genius !

Santa goes to a bar in London for a couple of drinks. As he is sitting alone and drinking, he notices a sexy woman sitting in a corner, alone and staring at him. At first he tries to ignore her, but the sight of her huge boobs is still rolling in his mind and he looks at her again. Now the woman smiles back at him and Santa gets very excited.
 
He gulps down a couple of neats and gathering courage goes upto her and says, "Excuse me...I am Santa from India. Can I sit here and buy you a drink?"
 
The woman agrees and soon both of them are drinking away like good old friends. Then after everything is through Santa and the lady walk out of the bar. But Santa is in a great mood to screw her.
 
Again gathering courage and slighty drunk, he asks her, "Eschcuse me, can we have sex tonight, please??"
 
The lady says, "Well I don t mind, but you see I’m on my menstrual cycle"
 
"No problem" says Santa "you proceed in your menstrual cycle, I will follow you in my Honda Accord !"
Ishant Kathuria jas ki yaad aa gyi..

Daba le Bhosdike Natak Mat kar...

Compromising with your woman doesn't mean you are wrong and she is right...

it only means that sex is more important than your ego...

There was Bihari who was very frustrated as he was not able to get married. He was not getting sex by hook or crook and was getting older. 
One day he decided to leave the world and went to Himalayas. While roaming in the jungles, he met a Baba. Told his problems to Baba. 

Baba looked at his hand and and said that as per his analysis, he must get married in next 7 days otherwise he will have to die as a virgin.  Baba knew whom is his would be wife , she lived in Newyork and he can help the man get married in next 7 days. Baba asked our guy to get his "baraat" within next 6 days and come back and then baba will get him married.

Apna bihari was confused, Newyork? ek gauri? how he will reach Newyork? But he followed what baba asked to do.

the guy came back to bihaar, got 50 people arranged and bring them to himalayas. 

Baba was happy to see that the guy was on time.

Baba removed all his cloths and sat down in samadhi under a tree. Suddenly his penis started to grow. It kept on growing like the trunk of a tree, then to the size of an airoplane. When it was around the size of a boing 747, he asked the guy and his baaraat to climb on top of his penis. Everyone got onto the penis and then it started growing length wise. it kept growing like the sheshnaag of mahabharata, lehrata hue flying over the himalyas, pakistan, dubai, europe and it was crossing the north atlantic ocean

Suddenly baba pulled his penis back. everyone fall into the atlantic. The vehicle was gone. 
The guy managed to swim across the ocean and return back to India and he directly went to baba.
Crying, frustrated, devastated, he questioned baba "Kyon baba kyon? Sab sahi jaa raha tha. Aapka chamatkar. hum newyork pahunchne hi waale the. Aisa kyon kiya aapne. Ab meri shaadi kaise hogi. Ab to mein kuwanra hi mar jaaonga. "

Baba was lying on the ground without cloths with his eyes closed, answered the guy  : 
"Baccha, tu shaadi ki chinta mat kar. Shaadi to mein abhi bhi kara doonga. 

Pehle tu ye bata ki biddi kisne bujhaai thi"
Satyarth Gupta

TL;DR

- Posting to khattacorp has been automated.
- Best khattas every 3 hours.
- QA being done today.
- Expect some loose ends.

Guys,

At KhattaCorp Labs, we have written an "Aggregation Engine" to fetch bestest new khattas from all over so that we always have a good khatta available whenever we want to post.

We strive to get you the best khattas and that too as frequently as possible. As you would have noticed, all my recent posts have "via local-khattacorp-com" appended. That is because we have also written a "Posting Engine" to automate postings to KhattaCorp. group.

This whole setup will ensure there is atleast one awesome khatta every 3 hours.
However, like all software, this too is a product in the making and nowhere close to completion. Infact today is the very first day of QA. So Expect some loose ends.

There may be repeated postings, posts that may make no sense, no posts even if there is a notification, etc. 
The current algorithm believes best khattas as a function of number of likes, comments, likes on comments, credibility_factor_of_the_source and shares. However a lot of comments may be there for a pathetic khatta in a community page having lakhs of members, making it rise up the lists and similar edge cases.

This will surely get better as time proceeds. Let me know if you see anything like that. 

Enjoy KhattaCorp. Spread smiles. Cheers.

~KhattaCorp. Labs

We would love to see the crowd interacting with some inputs from their end too. Khatta Corp is not only a source of entertainment it involves many people who give their best ideas their best potential to make you laugh to make this an innovative platform to share jokes and fun. 
Request you all to bear for us to make our mission a succesful one. :-) Hail KHATTA CORP. (y)

I like the idea but than it's crowd sourcing vs aggregation, aggregation is good way to keep fresh content but involvement  of users is more important for any community, you need to ensure that automated post don't hijack the attention of the posts done by individuals and not very frequent,  just a thought that came to my mind, anyways that can be tuned based on observation, best of luck with new initiative !!!

Thanks sir! That is precisely the idea! KhattaCorp. has to be crowd sourced. But many a times it so happens that there isn't any good content in the feed. At those times, the automated system will prove useful. To maintain a balance between users posts and the automated system, for the start, I have set the cron to run every 3 hours starting 11 AM IST to 11 PM IST. A more fine tuning will surely be required for sure. Lets observe this for a week or so. And please keep providing feedback.
Vishwajeet Sir Thanks for your humble feedbakc. We really appreciate people like you who not only get entertained but are truly concerned about Khatta Corp. Many Thanks :-)

I kind of agree with Vishwajeet sir, it seems to me too that 3 hours is a little too frequent. It might push down posts done by other members of the group. Also, people may start depending on the automated posts and stop sharing their khattas. I suppose as an initial testing period the random choice of 3 might work, but I hope that feedback from people will help you figure out an optimal number
Khatta Corp.: Superb hai...:)

I do not know how to put down techincal side of it but as you described i think a better way would be to...1) run it in a time based format{which obvously you said} ADDITIONAl CHECK 2) Why don't you go for checking the likes of the post and set a barrier limit i.e. something that atleast last 10 or 20 posts should touch a barrer of minimum 5 likes to not trigger the automated posting. This way you will only be triggering the AUTOMATED POSTING when sites missing your so called MASALA TADKA :P..... Having said that it's an idea...i still have to check if there an API for it[for FB ofcourse] ...feel free to correct me

Anand Shukla that is exactly what the current code does!! We have aggregated a lot of content from a lot of sources (facebook groups and pages constitute a big chunk). Current code figures out the khatta_quotient of every foreign content before dumping it to the database. khatta_quotient depends on a lot of factors. some of them being number_of_likes, number_of_comments, average_likes on each comment and credibility_quotient of the source. this makes sure that there are good quality khattas in the pool always. however we still face some edge cases. e.g. a post saying "Happy friendships day" in a facebook group having 45K members had over 1600 likes and over 1000 comments. the credibility_quotient had also been good, so this post reached almost to the top in our khatta pool. However this does not deserve to be posted here. So such cases may still be there. We'll figure those out and will try to patch our algorithm to handle those cases as well. on a lighter note, why don't you join KhattaCorp. labs?? An open offer ;-)

ohh.. Anand Shukla sorry I misread some parts. I thought you are concerned about the quality of khattas that the automated system posts!! And yes.. adjusting the frequency depending on current state of the stream also seems like a good idea. Thanks!! And yes making a query to the graph API at  https://graph.facebook.com/<group_id>/feed/?access_token=<access_tooken> gets you the stream of that group. However generating access tokens is another mess. Read http://www.princemishra.com/facebook-long-lived-access-tokens-and-related-shit/ for more pointers.

Prakriti Mateti yes mam!.. 3 hours looks too frequent..! a dependency on the automated system will be bad.. lets also evaluate "every 4 hours and trigger an additional one if the state of the stream is bad." We'll also need to decide what we term as a bad stream. what say Vishwajeet sir?
I would wish, FB developers would give you a button "Best Khatta of the day" and you hook your algo on that click. So if I want to read the best khatta of the day I can get it when I want it.

The problem with many users who are less persistent on FB is that when the feeds are too much, we miss the good khattas...and as the community grows, it will be difficult for even persistent people to read good ones. I think then people would prefer to subscribe to khatta gurus and read khattas only from them ... So I think I like your idea very much to keep the best khattas on top and ofcourse as everyone is concerned, you can always tweak the algo ... Its not that you are going to put random khattas on top, they will be the best one. So i dont think people would mind it.. if my khatta is good and people like it , it will jump up against others
I forget to say this, you guys are doing amazing job. sorry for spamming. going back to coding now

Vijender Sir : That would be probably need to write a facebook app and use that app as part of this group. Prince : Coming back to the question of bad stream, it can be based on multiple criterion, tuned with time, observation  and need to be mixed with some NLP I am trying to sound geeky lolzzz.... I feel lets get the ball rolling with whatever is already done and wait for some user feedback and observe the trends, we can debate out and come up with different ideas but ultimately best product is one which is loved by it's user, let them decide what they want, need to put some serious thought process, let me think more on this and I request other community members to come up with their suggestions as well after all it's for them.

Vijender Sir : "subscribe to users" and "best khatta of the day" are very promising ideas. Thanks!! and u r very right. as the community grows, people would definitely wish to subscribe to specific users! it may not be possible to implement those in the facebook group though.. how about taking this up on the website? we'll have more flexibility there! i am thinking of a model where the group stays the way it is today and the website provides such functionalities - "subscription", "best khatta of the day", "best of khattacorp" are some that i can think of. maybe we can also host contests there. Vishwajeet Sir, Prakriti Ma'm, Ankur, Abhishek and everyone reading this - inputs please!!!
Vishwajeet Sir : hehe with NLP, things started flying over the head :P this would need some serious thinking!!

Vishwajeet Singh yes a facebook app would be appropriate and it would be the platform to add more functionalities. Prince Mishra As you said you should continue to run the group as it is and not move out rright now. But its a good idea to develop a website with larger vision. Your streamer can feed data from FB to the website. and ofcourse more content and a much larger community can be built. So are you looking at FB version of "comedy circus"  :).

I can tell you that i would pay to watch Raju Shrivastav's show, Kapil, Sudesh Leheri, Krishna and many more comedians. I and close friends use to watch them again and again whenever we used to meet and ROFTL.

As talked about Prince what was original idea of the site was to let others post there and the best khattas can find their way on FB group or the site or even the best khatta of the day, most prevalent these things can be added according to the need of the hour. what do you say ?

Vijender sir: fb version of comedy circus seems interesting! a text-only version perhaps! though i think, i should start with an FB canvas application first. with some of the ideas implemented - khatta of the day, etc. Ankur Yadav No.. I kind of disagree. People would not move away from the group on to the website, unless the website offers something earth-shatteringly useful- subscriptions, etc! what i now propose is lets make the website completely admin-managed. and let it source the bestest content from the large khatta database that we have built. users will have an option to add content to the website, but they will have to go through a manual scrutiny first!
Prince Mishra I am imagining the earth-shattering idea ... a portal that has text, video library , audio, post your video
Vijender sir : why leave images ;-)

Vijender Sir, Vishwajeet Sir we will have all videos, images but not porn or cheap ones. Like you might have seen constant monitoring of KC group is done and such things are immediately removed by warning the user and if he/she repeats then banning them pemanently. Fun should be double meaning but not vulgar. So these things are there. But frankly speaking your inputs are really appreciable and we thank you for your valuable inputs (y) #AITfraternity

Ankur Yadav where is the censorship??? 9 out of 10 khattas are super non-veg, onenly, not even double meaning but they are only one meaning... and I think yourself and price both are  the top contributors . :)

Vijender  sir you didn get my point...i m talking about cheapgiri ..like posting porn images or something like that...KC is full of non-veg everyone likes that but we do no promote vulgarity. I hope you understand our viewpoint now :-)

Ankur Yadav Vulgarity has different meaning for different persons. For me, i do not "like" or "share" 9 out of 10 khattas because I do not want my kid, family members, and young cousins to read those. I do not want to sound hypocritical here but there is a decorum that i would like to maintain when I collaborate with my elders and juniors. So I dont share those 9 out of 10 khattas because they ARE vulgar.

Vijender Sir It's upto you what you consider it. KC basically serves you the non-veg Khatta's dose. We do not force people to come to us and read it. If people want to then they come and read it. It's similar that evrery porn is not made for you but when you want you do download and see. No-one is kid here every one is grown up and understand whom to share what to share. Apologies but if you want to read you can if you don want to read we are not forcing you. KC is non-veg and not vulgar, not cheap and it remain like this forever.

BTW this is how google defines word vulgar "Making explicit and offensive reference to sex or bodily functions; coarse and rude: "a vulgar joke"." and wikipeadia defines non-veg jokes also known as off-color humor as "The term off-color humor (also known as vulgar humor or crude humor)"  so as per these definition most of jokes in KC are vulgar no doubt in that,  lets not play with words just for the sake of it, non-veg is just a way to mask the vulgarity in civilized world that is all it does nothing else.......most of things are just matter perspective definition of cheap and vulgar may differ for everyone and there's no point debating on it. IMHO it's your brain child and you better know where you want to take it so no need to feel offensive about any feedback which is being given and do what you think is right for KC and yes  when you put this as website you will have to put explicitly as 18+ content or you can be sued for it and can face legal implications period.

ankur, yes we know what we are reading here. my comment was in reply to your comment where you explicitly talked about how much you are keeping this group a non vulgar group and avoidibg cheap giri. so o would say that you dont need to say that. i love reading non veg humurous jokes and thats why i come here

guys guys guys.. please relax! Vijender Sir, Vishwajeet Sir : all he means to say is he takes good amount of effort to keep the feed clean! as the community has grown, we have gathered both good and bad members. Good ones post khattas (which includes all the nonveg. it IS super vulgar. I agree 110%. There is no word play about that. our definition of vulgar) and the Bad ones post advertisements of viagra, pornographic images (ankur's definition of vulgar) with links to download more. It has become ankur's job to clean the feed of such content. And Thank you Ankur for that! We never mean to keep this group non-vulgar! Perhaps that is our USP! That is the reason we even exist. Ankur Yadav : Relax Angry Head!
got it. so what ankur meant is he is cleaning "spam". and yes his work is appreciated there.
Yes! Precisely!
